hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Boomerang#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Malon).text: I wanna be a rocketship, @! Please help me live my dreams!

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that there's a 1/201 chance per Rupee that the Zora from the diving minigame tosses a 500 Rupee?^Keep winning and the odds go up!

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Hookshot#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Vines Above Stairs

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Kakariko Bazaar#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Water Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Basement Near Switches Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Market Bazaar#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
